refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The ltscompare tool determines whether or not the labelled transition systems (LTSs) in &infile1; and &infile2; are the same modulo some equivalence. If &infile1; is not supplied, &stdin; is used.

The input formats are determined by the content of &infile1; and &infile2;. The options &opt_in1; and &opt_in2; can be used to force the format of &infile1; and &infile2;, respectively. A list of supported formats can be requested by using the option &opt_formats;.
